name: Splashy Bird & Angry Puppy
description:
The new amazing Splashy Bird is now on your iPhone.

Tap on your device to make the bird fly. Avoid obstacles to level up, escape from the angry puppy, and most importantly... beat your friends high score.

- So cute dot design!
- The thrilling escape from angry puppy!
- Convenient control!
- Very much Fun!
- Classical and Old-school!
- Very social with game center!


Please watch out! Please rescue birdie from angry puppy

Have Fun!
